channel.title: Comments on: Equipment Review: Leather Goban

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Nice job on your half board! Definitely a clever idea for solving tsumego problems. You should get in touch with AmbyR00 to exchange ideas on what to do with your leather! I'm sure you guys could come up with lots of clever create go boards. =)
item.content:encoded: Nice job on your half board! Definitely a clever idea for solving tsumego problems. You should get in touch with AmbyR00 to exchange ideas on what to do with your leather! I’m sure you guys could come up with lots of clever create go boards. =)

item.title: By: Ruben Berenguel
item.dc:creator: Ruben Berenguel
item.description: Last year I made me a half-board for tsumego solving ( http://www.lifein19x19.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=150356#p150356 ) I have access to all kinds of leather, but no printing presses, sadly. I drew the lines by hand with a permanent marker (after marking them by pressure.) A few days ago I also made a 13x13 hex board, I want to improve my hex abilities somewhat (I suck at hex)
item.content:encoded: Last year I made me a half-board for tsumego solving ( http://www.lifein19x19.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=150356#p150356 ) I have access to all kinds of leather, but no printing presses, sadly. I drew the lines by hand with a permanent marker (after marking them by pressure.) A few days ago I also made a 13×13 hex board, I want to improve my hex abilities somewhat (I suck at hex)

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Sorry for the delay! But I'll definitely be updating this review soon this week!
item.content:encoded: Sorry for the delay! But I’ll definitely be updating this review soon this week!

item.title: By: AmbyR00
item.dc:creator: AmbyR00
item.description: Hi! I sent some background info to Ben a while ago. I bet he'll update this post soon to include some facts about this product. :) - Jaro
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I wish I did! I shot him a message to see if there's anything else he wants to add to the product, but I think the fastest way to find out the answer to your question is to go ahead and hit him up on Twitter! =D
item.content:encoded: I wish I did! I shot him a message to see if there’s anything else he wants to add to the product, but I think the fastest way to find out the answer to your question is to go ahead and hit him up on Twitter! =D

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: Do you have any details from AmbyR00 about the story behind this product? Curious what previous experience AmbyR00 had with leather, what inspired them (sorry, the name's ambiguous) to make a goban like this, etc.
item.content:encoded: Do you have any details from AmbyR00 about the story behind this product? Curious what previous experience AmbyR00 had with leather, what inspired them (sorry, the name’s ambiguous) to make a goban like this, etc.
